author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. Masters Day Four
text:
AUGUSTA, Ga. (Reuters) - Highlights from the final round of the 82nd U.S. Masters on Sunday:
Tiger Woods of the U.S hits off the first fairway during final round play of the 2018 Masters golf tournament at the Augusta National Golf Club in Augusta, Georgia, U.S. April 8, 2018. REUTERS/Lucy Nicholson COOL WEATHER GREETS EARLY STARTERS The final round of the year’s first major got underway with the early starters taking to the course under cloudy skies and unusually cool conditions at Augusta National where the mid-morning temperature was 63 Fahrenheit (17 Celsius).
Slideshow (2 Images) REED, MCILROY GET READY FOR SHOWDOWN Patrick Reed will take a three-shot lead into the final round when he sets off with Northern Irishman Rory McIlroy in the day’s final pairing at 2:40 p.m. ET (1849 GMT).
Reporting by Frank Pingue; Editing by Toby Davis
